                    Context: 
                    This section is part of Erowid’s comprehensive MDMA (Ecstasy) information archive within the "Chemicals" category. It provides an index of topics related to MDMA, including neurotoxicity, human and animal studies, pharmacology, cognitive and health effects, fatalities, and therapeutic uses, along with donation information and update history.
